mp2.model

Interface Matrix

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMatrix, ModularMatrix

    public interface Matrix

               int row1,
               int row2)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        adds a multiple of a column to another column
        Parameters:
        scalar - scalar for row to add
        row1 - row to multiply by zero-indexed
        row2 - row to replace zero-indexed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row out of bounds

 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
